physical_appearance:\The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It has a black frame and its border is white in colour. The location of an administrative building
 with a television
 telephone
 desk
 and office chair
 is depicted. A man in uniform is sitting on the edge of the table and holding the receiver of the telephone. The flag of Malaysia is displayed on the wall
 at the upper left hand side of the photograph. Below the flag on the notice board
 the initials \\KTM\\ (Keretapi Tanah Melayu) are displayed\

sgcool_label_text:\This image features the station master at the Bukit Timah railway station. It is part of the \\Tracking Memories\\ collection by the late Mr Kwek Leng Joo. The collection captures different aspects of the Malayan Railway story in Singapore

metadata.title_text: Untitled (station master at Bukit Timah railway station)
metadata.physical_appearance: "The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It has a black frame and its border is white in colour. The location of an administrative building, with a television, telephone, desk, and office chair, is depicted. A man in uniform is sitting on the edge of the table and holding the receiver of the telephone. The flag of Malaysia is displayed on the wall, at the upper left hand side of the photograph. Below the flag on the notice board, the initials ""KTM"" (Keretapi Tanah Melayu) are displayed"
